Summaries.eng: A peaceful boatman once known as the Black Samurai is pulled back into conflict when he takes a little girl with mysterious powers under his wing.
Summaries.jpn: かつて黒人侍として名をはせ、今は船頭として平穏な日々を送るひとりの戦士。邪悪な力に狙われた不思議な少女を守るため、再び壮絶な戦いへと身を投じていく。

Summaries.eng:
Yasuke brings together the best of east and west for a new type of animation that slashes through expectations.

Hear from the top talent behind the project, including Academy Award-nominated actor LaKeith Stanfield, director LeSean Thomas, character designer Takeshi Koike and composer Flying Lotus as they talk about how the look, feel and sound of Yasuke came together.

Summaries.ita: In un Giappone feudale straziato dalla guerra in preda a mecha e magia, Yasuke, il più grande ronin mai esistito, fatica a condurre una vita pacifica dopo un passato di violenze. Ma quando un villaggio vicino è dilaniato da scontri tra daimyo assetati di guerra, Yasuke deve riprendere in mano la spada e portare in salvo una misteriosa bambina minacciata da forze oscure e signori malvagi. La storia di Yasuke, il primo samurai africano che ha lottato nelle fila di Oda Nobunaga, uscirà in tutto il mondo.

Summaries.eng: When her young daughter is stricken by a mysterious malady, Ichika asks Yasuke to bring them upriver to a special doctor, but Yasuke refuses.
Summaries.jpn: 酒場の歌手である一華から、病気の娘を医者に診せるため川を上ってほしいと頼まれた弥助。あまりにも危険なその頼みを、すげなく断る弥助だったが...。

Titles.jpn: 古(いにしえ)より続く道

Summaries.eng: Back in 1581, Yasuke and Natsumaru have become trusted warriors serving Nobunaga. In the present day, the mercenaries catch up to Yasuke and attack.
Summaries.jpn: 1581年、夏丸とともに信長公に仕える弥助は、その戦いぶりで主君の信頼を勝ち取っていく。一方、現在の弥助の前に、手強い敵が再び姿を現す。

Summaries.eng: Abraham sends Haruto and Nikita out to find Saki, who uses her growing powers to fight back. Under torture, Yasuke has a flashback to a betrayal.
Summaries.jpn: アブラハムの指示で咲希を追うハルトとニキータだが、力を増した咲希はそう簡単に捕まらない。拷問を受ける弥助の脳裏に、過去の裏切りがよみがえる。

Summaries.eng: Back in the village, Saki asks Yasuke to bring her to Doctor Morisuke — and she won’t take no for an answer. But there are new enemies in pursuit.
Summaries.jpn: 守助という医者のもとへ連れて行ってほしいと咲希から頼まれた弥助は、その頑なな態度に根負けする。危険な道を行く2人の背後に、新たな敵が迫りくる。

Summaries.eng: While Morisuke protects Saki from the Daimyo’s attack on the Astral Plane, Yasuke confronts the masked Dark General, who reveals their true identity.
Summaries.jpn: 生と死の境界である"幽界"で、闇の大名の攻撃から咲希を守る守助。一方、闇の将軍と対じした弥助は、面の下に隠された驚くべき素顔を知ることになる

Summaries.eng: While Morisuke and his men create a protective shield around the temple, Yasuke and Saki face off with the Daimyo in Azuchi Castle.
Summaries.jpn: 霊力を使い、寺を守るための盾を張りめぐらす守助たち。咲希とともに安土城に向かった弥助を、闇の大名との壮絶な戦いが待ち受けていた。
